description: This plugin evaluates a Objective Function on the MSA. It provides a single 0 to 1 decimal score.
citation: J.D. Thompson, F. Plewniak, R. Ripp, J.C. Thierry and O. Poch, Towards a reliable objective function for multiple sequence alignments. J. Mol. Biol. 314 (2001), pp. 937–951.
affiliations: Laboratoire de Biologie et Génomique Structurales Institut de Génétique et de Biologie Moléculaire et Cellulaire, (CNRS/INSERM/ULP), B.P. 163, 67404 Illkirch Cedex, France
